scripts.validate:avp: bash -lc "if command -v bun >/dev/null 2>&1; then bun run packages/provider/tools/avp-validate.ts --dir packages/provider/examples/avp; else echo '[skip] bun not installed; skipping AVP validation locally'; fi"
scripts.go:lint: bash -lc 'cd packages/provider && go mod tidy && go vet ./...'
scripts.go:test: bash -lc "if command -v go >/dev/null 2>&1; then cd packages/provider && go mod tidy && go test ./... -coverprofile=coverage.out -covermode=count; else echo '[skip] go not installed; skipping provider tests locally'; fi"
